Modifies the behaviour of a subsequent call to preferLocaleFonts() to use Mincho instead of Gothic for dialoginput in JA locales on windows. Not needed on other platforms.
This is an extension of the {@link FontManager} interface which has to be implemented on systems that want to use SunGraphicsEnvironment. It adds a couple of methods that are only required by SGE. Graphics implementations that use their own GraphicsEnvironment are not required to implement this and can use plain FontManager instead.
Return an array of created Fonts, or null, if no fonts were created yet.
